title: Mona Lisa Watch Face
summary: Mona Lisa Watch Face for Android Wear devices, from Da Vinci's painting.
description: Mona Lisa Watch Face is a watch face application for Android Wear devices, showing the famous face from Leonardo Da Vinci's painting.The application has some customizations:* displaying or not the day of the month (in Roman numbers)* displaying or not the tick marks In ambient mode, only the needles are visible.Only compatible with Android Wear watches:Asus ZenWatchHuawei WatchLG G WatchLG G Watch-RLG Urbane WatchMoto 360Samsung Gear LiveSony SmartWatch 3...
descriptionHTML:
Mona Lisa Watch Face is a watch face application for Android Wear devices, showing the famous face from Leonardo Da Vinci's painting.

The application has some customizations:
* displaying or not the day of the month (in Roman numbers)
* displaying or not the tick marks

In ambient mode, only the needles are visible.

Only compatible with Android Wear watches:
Asus ZenWatch
Huawei Watch
LG G Watch
LG G Watch-R
LG Urbane Watch
Moto 360
Samsung Gear Live
Sony SmartWatch 3
...
